rig_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Name: Mil-Sim: Pararescue I armored rig
rig_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Description: Tactical rig with additional 4-class armor plates used by Mil-Sim: Pararescue operator.

minimap_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Name: Mil-Sim: Pararescue I molle backpack
minimap_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Description: Tactical molle backpack that can be attached at the back of the rig used by Mil-Sim: Pararescue operator.

scarf_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Name: Mil-Sim: Pararescue I scarf
scarf_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Description: Simple neck scarf used by Mil-Sim: Pararescue operator.

helmet_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Name: Mil-Sim: Pararescue I helmet
helmet_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Description: Ballistic helmet with a variety of attachments used by Mil-Sim: Pararescue operator.

headset_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Name: Mil-Sim: Pararescue I headset
headset_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Description: Active headset used by Mil-Sim: Pararescue operator.

batterypack_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Name: Mil-Sim: Pararescue I battery pouch
batterypack_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Description: Tactical helmet battery pouch for secure carrying of an IFF strobe or combat tourniquet, exterior loops for chemlights and loop pile surfaces for unit patches or other hooks & loop accessories used by Mil-Sim: Pararescue operator.

helmetlight_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Name: Mil-Sim: Pararescue I dummy helmet light
helmetlight_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Description: Dummy light that can be attached to the helmet used by Mil-Sim: Pararescue operator.

ms2000_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Name: MS2000 Marker
ms2000_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Description: The marker is used by Mil-Sim: Pararescue operator during nighttime operations. It emits signal in the IR region which are visible through NVGs. Uses special filter when operating in the IR mode, if the filter is removed, it appears as a bright flash in the visible spectrum. In the extended mode operates with a blue flash.

glasses_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Name: Tactical glasses
glasses_mp_western_milsim_pj_1_1.Description: Tactical glasses with glare and impact protection used by Mil-Sim: Pararescue operator.
